name: Shooter (SpaceKitten2700)
description:
My First Serious Project, so it's a little bit scuffed
Infinite Wave Of Enemy, Just Leave If You Got Bored
WASD for Movement
Left Shift + Move to dash (more like teleporting)
LMB or Left CTR to shoot
Have Fun!
Ps: There's no download, and I'm more likely to not continuing this project
